Test Name: Drugs of Abuse (10-Panel) and Alcohol Screen, Serum
Purpose: To detect and measure the presence of common drugs of abuse (10-panel) and alcohol in serum for clinical assessment and compliance monitoring.
Container: Serum Separator Tube (SST) or Red Top Tube
Equipment: Designated analyzer equipped with Drugs of Abuse 10-Panel Test Kit and Alcohol Screen Reagent Kit, centrifuge, pipettes
